overview:
Liz is Co-Founder and CMO of 121Giving, and Managing Partner of Affinity Interactive Group.

She has 10+ years experience in account service, art direction and interactive marketing in retail, online products and the nonprofit sector. She has a graduate degree in design and has straddled design and account service roles for most of her career in agencies and internal roles.

In the last few years Liz has served as Interactive Account Director for a wide range of accounts including Central Market, LIVESTRONG, HEB and The Michael J. Fox Foundation. For the last year she has served as Marketing Director at Austin Goodwill, before joining Affinity IG in October, 2011.
